snippet.title: SM64 Randomizer - Release!
snippet.description:
Note: This version is outdated, the latest version is v0.5 found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjxgQ6RF8WY

Download: http://www.mediafire.com/file/y78kn1qwmnk02br/SM64_Randomizer_v0.1.zip/file
Discord: https://discord.gg/vdWwUgc
My twitter: https://twitter.com/arthurtilly413

SM64 Randomizer is a ROM hack designed to create a new game every time you play. When you select a file, a "seed" is created which governs the placement of objects in levels, the star requirements on doors and the warps to new levels. These things will stay the same throughout your playthrough unless you reset the game.

This hack is still quite new so some stars may not be possible, but I have made sure that almost every star will be possible. You should certainly be able to beat the game with any seed, and if the warps or objects are too inconvenient, you can simply reset the game to get a new seed without losing any progress.
